LanguageData.SimpleTrainingExpanded.Settings.Title: Anomalies Expected
LanguageData.SimpleTrainingExpanded.Settings.ShowSkil: Show progress bar during skill training.
LanguageData.SimpleTrainingExpanded.Settings.SkillTra: Continue skill training after reaching daily XP limit.
LanguageData.SimpleTrainingExpanded.Training.Descript: Can be used for training of skills:
LanguageData.SimpleTrainingExpanded.Training.ChangeSk: Change training facility from {0} to selected skill.
LanguageData.SimpleTrainingExpanded.Training.AutoChan: Will auto change training facility skill to the fit user preferences.
